pages.text: Aqua Bubble creates a shield around you that not only absorbs damage, but reduces the damage taken from fire-based attacks, and makes you immune to lava.$(br2)With modifiers, these bonuses are amplified, affect familiars, or grants resistance. You can also knock back attackers, reflect fire damage, or damage undead attackers.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:aqua_bubble/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Duration:$() The bubble lasts $(spell:aqua_bubble/SECONDS/duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Fire:$() Fire damage is reduced to $(spell:aqua_bubble/PERCENT/fire_reduction) of the original.$(br2)$(bold)Lava:$() Lava damage is reduced to $(spell:aqua_bubble/PERCENT/lava_reduction) of the original.$(br2)$(bold)Knockback:$() With the $(modifier:bubble_knockback)$() modifier, attackers are knocked back by $(spell:aqua_bubble/knockback).

$(bold)Amplified:$() With the $(modifier:bubble_amplified)$() modifier, spell effects are boosted by $(spell:aqua_bubble/PERCENT/amplifier).$(br2)$(bold)Familiars:$() With the $(modifier:faithful_sharing)$() modifier, a familiar within $(spell:aqua_bubble/radius_x) and $(spell:aqua_bubble/radius_z) horizontally and $(spell:aqua_bubble/radius_y) vertically is shielded.$(br2)$(bold)Slowness:$() With the $(modifier:barkskin)$() amplifier, attackers are given Slowness $(spell:aqua_bubble/ROMAN/slowness_amplifier) for $(spell:aqua_bubble/SECONDS/slowness_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Undead:$() With the $(modifier:spirit_bubble)$() modifier, attacks by undead are reduced to $(spell:aqua_bubble/PERCENT/undead_reduction) of the original.

$(bold)Resistance:$() With the $(modifier:stoneskin)$() modifier, the spell also gives Resistance $(spell:aqua_bubble/ROMAN/resistance_amplifier) for $(spell:aqua_bubble/SECONDS/resistance_duration).$(br2)$(bold)Magic Resistance:$() With the $(modifier:moon_bubble)$() modifier, magic damage is reduced to $(spell:aqua_bubble/PERCENT/magic_resistance) of the original.$(br2)$(bold)Reflection:$() With the $(modifier:reflective_bubble)$() modifier, fire damage you take is reflected to the attacker as physical damage.
$(bold)Poison Resistance:$() With the $(modifier:poison_protection)$() modifier, you are immune to poison for the duration of the bubble.
